# HKAuthorizationStatus.sharingDenied

**Case**

The user has explicitly denied your app permission to save data of the specified type.

## Declaration

```swift
case sharingDenied
```

## Constants

- **HKAuthorizationStatus.notDetermined**: The user has not yet chosen to authorize access to the specified data type.
- **HKAuthorizationStatus.sharingAuthorized**: The user has explicitly authorized your app to save data of the specified type.
